name: What I Charge
author: Squiggle Development LLC

sections.description: What I Charge simplifies your life by allowing you to dynamically generate price quotes for the products and services you offer. Start with your base price then include any additional features or addon options. Your client gets a running price total as options are selected. When they are finished an email is sent to you showing all of their choices. Spend more time working on what you love and less time dealing with clients.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/wicfree directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the \’Plugins\’ screen in WordPress
  3. Make sure you add the \”What I Charge\” page to your nav menu or wherever you would like the link to appear.
